Package jason.infra.saci

Class Summary
SaciAgArch This class provides an agent architecture when using SACI Infrastructure to run the MAS.
SaciEnvironment This class implements the saci version of the environment infrastructure tier.
SaciExecutionControl Concrete execution control implementation based on saci distributed infrastructure.
SaciFactory  
SaciMASLauncherAnt Creates the scripts to launch the MAS using SACI and starts SACI before the agents.
SaciRuntimeServices
